title: Your device is unprotected!
body: Install ‘UltraSecure AV’ now to remove 12 threats.

choices.label: Install Now
choices.feedback: Risky choice. Fake antiviruses steal data. Real security apps are installed from your device’s official store or vendor site.

choices.label: Open official app store
choices.feedback: Great choice. Check the app’s name, publisher and reviews in the official store before installing.
